<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Test UI for UW location">d44ddded3390a650875176a59d5c7b2e</macroponent><name>rich_text_11/html</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */

function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  if(api.state.isexpanded == false)
  return api.data.look_up_records_1.results[0].experience_insight.displayValue.substring(0, 180) + "…";
  else if(api.state.isexpanded == true)
  return api.data.look_up_records_1.results[0].displayValue;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sanket</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-04-09 06:49:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>8216d2a133b82a50875176a59d5c7bec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>rich_text_11/html</sys_name><sys_package display_value="underwriter.ai" source="x_ltin2_uw_ai">5365c533935496d08b8674121bba10e7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="underwriter.ai">5365c533935496d08b8674121bba10e7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8216d2a133b82a50875176a59d5c7bec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sanket</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-04-10 08:35:04</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
